page.title: 04NORTH ELPHINSTONE FARM
page.content: NORTH ELPHINSTONE FARM IS ABOUT HALF A MILE FROM ELPHINSTONE.IT IS QUITE A BIG FARM WITH FIELDS.MOST OF THE FIELDS GROW CORN.THERE ARE TWO BIG SILOS ON THE FARM AND TWO BIG BARNS NEXT TO THE SILOS.ONE OF THEM HAS TRACTORS IN IT AND THE OTHER HAS BULLS IN IT.THE FARMER WHO OWNS IT IS CALLED MALCOM HARVEY.IN THE SUMMER I GET A JOB CLEARING OUT THE GRAIN BINS AND TAKING THE WILD OATS OUT OF THE CORN FIELDS.THERE IS A LITTLE SHED ON THE FARM WHERE THE THE FARMER KEEPS CALVES AND I CAN FEED THEM WITH A BABY'S BOTTLE WITH MILK IN IT.PEOPLE PLAY ON THE BALES WHEN THE FARMER IS NOT LOOKING.
